definitions.definition: physical activity that you do to make your body strong and healthy:
examples: Swimming is my favourite form of exercise.

definitions.definition: to do physical activities to make your body strong and healthy:
examples: She exercises most evenings usually by running.

definitions.definition: If you exercise an animal, you make it walk or run so that it stays strong and healthy:
examples: Now he's retired he spends most afternoons exercising his dogs.
